ch.zhaw.ba10_bsha_1.ime
Class CandidateView

java.lang.Object
  View
      ch.zhaw.ba10_bsha_1.ime.CandidateView

public class CandidateView
extends View

Implementation of a candidate View for our IME. Could be used to show suggested word-completions for our input. Currently not used for our Input Method, have a look at the SoftKeyboard example in the SDK to see how it would be done. Copied from the SoftKeyboard example from the Android SDK without modifications.
